subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
; classifier for occurrences "time"
: {{zh-ref|Zhao (1990)}} and {{zh-ref|Li (2005)}} consider this to be a {{der|zh|qfa-tak}} substrate word; compare {{cog|za|baez}}, {{cog|pcc|baiz}}, {{cog|onb|fɔi³}}.
